description: Master record of SQL updates for the Unified WVS Protocol.

updates.description: Standardizes all tables by renaming legacy 'nolan_score' columns to 'wvs_score' and dropping redundant duplicates. Ensures 0-10 scale platform-wide.
Updated to use 'wvs_score' and 0-5 demand labels accurately.
Switched from nolan_score/10 to direct wvs_score fetch for accurate pulse velocity display.
